data.author: Satya Nadella
data.quote: We've had great successes, but our future is not about our past success. It's going to be about whether we will invent things that are really going to drive our future.

data.author: Thomas Jefferson
data.quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.

data.author: Maria Montessori
data.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'

data.author: Elbert Hubbard
data.quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much.

data.author: James Wolfe
data.quote: I congratulate you, my brave countrymen and fellow soldiers, on the spirit and success with which you have executed this important part of our enterprise.

data.author: Adam Beach
data.quote: I do a lot of inspirational talks for kids, to motivate them to change their lives and give them hope.

data.author: Charles Horton Cooley
data.quote: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one.

data.author: Marquis de Sade
data.quote: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.

data.author: Stevie Wonder
data.quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.

data.author: Naveen Jain
data.quote: Success doesn't necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution. A great strategy alone won't win a game or a battle; the win comes from basic blocking and tackling.

data.author: Selena Gomez
data.quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely.

data.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
data.quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.

data.author: Margaret Thatcher
data.quote: People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top.

data.author: Bradley Whitford
data.quote: With the success of a show, you get an opportunity to call attention to things that you believe in.

data.author: Bobby Keys
data.quote: I pull a lot of the stuff that I play off the rhythm tracks - and Keith Richards has been one of the main contributors to my inspirational playing.

data.author: Matthew Prior
data.quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

data.author: Michael Dell
data.quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.

data.author: Lily Tomlin
data.quote: Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.

data.author: Flip Wilson
data.quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
